name: Grow-Bot
description:
Missed Deadline Entry for Kenney Jam 2022 / missed by 5 minutes...

Quick Game like Mario 1

Collect yellow to grow / shrint when hit

Up arrow key to Jump on ememies to beat them

Left / Right Keys to Move

2D Art by: Kenney

Sound & Music by: Bart, Shades & dklon

Coding by: GraphicDNA

Jammed Together by: sketche.99
